mapper.select: select count(*)as count from tb_car where vip_id=1;

select c.car_id,c.car_num,c.car_color,c.car_type,c.car_brand,c.vip_id,u.user_id, u.user_name,u.user_tel from tb_car c left join tb_user_car uc on uc.car_id=c.car_id left join tb_user u on u.user_id=uc.user_id where c.vip_id=1 limit #{start},#{pageSize};
mapper.update: update tb_car set vip_id=1,combo_id=6,end_time='' where car_num=#{carNum};
update tb_car set vip_id=0,combo_id=0 where car_num=#{carNum};
mapper.select: select c.*,b.combo_name from tb_car c left join tb_combo b on b.combo_id=c.combo_id where car_num=#{carNum};
mapper.update: update tb_car set combo_id=#{comboId},end_time=#{endTime} where car_num=#{carNum} and vip_id=2;
mapper.select: select * from tb_exit order by exit_time desc limit #{start} , #{end}

select c.car_brand,c.car_color,c.car_id,c.car_num,c.car_type,c.combo_id,d.combo_name,c.end_time,a.user_id,a.user_name,a.user_tel from tb_user a left join tb_user_car b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join tb_car c on b.car_id = c.car_id left join tb_combo d on c.combo_id = d.combo_id where a.user_tel = #{userTel}
